meanings.definition: Of or relating to the heath family of plants, which includes rhododendrons and heathers.
meanings.sent1: The ericaceous flowers in the garden added a beautiful touch of color.
meanings.sent2: Many gardeners prefer to plant ericaceous species for their acidic soil requirements.
meanings.sent3: The ericaceous plants had a secret meeting to discuss their upcoming bloom show.
meanings.sent4: Her love for ericaceous plants was as deep as the roots of a rhododendron.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the ericaceous blossoms filled the air with a sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the heath family.
meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully tended to the ericaceous in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: An ericaceous can thrive in acidic soil conditions where other plants struggle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash under the ericaceous.
meanings.sent4: The ericaceous stood tall among the other plants, proud of its heritage.
meanings.sent5: Children in the park marveled at the tiny flowers of the ericaceous shrub.
